TopicTitle: Internal seperated from capsule - help please

Articles.Content:
Hi guys, I made an internal for the Vostok capsule I'm working on the problem with it is it doesn't "follow" the spacecraft, it is seperated from it as soon as it appears on the launchpad"

Does anyone have an idea what happened there? Thank you in advance.
I would be interested in this, I had a similar problem before... By the way, Awesome Capsule! I love Vostock, Soyuz and russian spacecraft like the LK.

had the same problem once when using mods, i completly re installed ksp, had a long goodbye to my saves and it was fine afterwards... though you can probably keep your save games (mine were kinda... damaged, so i started clean).

and grammar soviet does not approve of grammar nazi

GUYS! I know how to fix it! Finally. If you want to know - you should create 16 layer and call it "kerbals"

Thanks Bobcat and dimovski for help!
Can't wait to use that Vostok. Will there be a version with the ejector chair?
mhm. can't wait for that vostok mrthebull.
What shader are you using? The texture looks strange, but nice modell never the less =)
